content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-11.5, 26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0)

### Assembling machine for automation science pack at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into machines. For example, iron gear wheels are needed for the assembling machine to craft automation science packs.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power supply
- Check that all machines, especially the assembling machine and lab, are connected to a power source to avoid them being inactive due to lack of electricity.
